name: Catacombs 1: Demon War
description: Catacombs 1: Demon War is the first of a 3-chapter RPG/Adventure that puts you into the shoes of a brave young hero, building your strength to face long-buried secrets, deception and betrayal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Pentium Quad Core or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 610 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended for music and sound Additional Notes: 1280x720 resolution required, supports gamepad
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or higher Processor: Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM
